articles.author: John Fritze, Tierney Sneed
articles.title: Supreme Court rules Pennsylvania may count back-up votes when mail ballots are rejected - CNN
articles.description: The US Supreme Court on Friday left in place a Pennsylvania court ruling that is expected to expand options for voters whose mail-in ballots are rejected for technical reasons to have their votes counted, in a defeat for Republicans in a critical battleground…
articles.content: The US Supreme Court on Friday left in place a Pennsylvania court ruling that is expected to expand options for voters whose mail-in ballots are rejected for technical reasons to have their votes cou… [+6960 chars]

articles.title: Earth’s Invisible Shield Rebounds: The Remarkable 2024 Ozone Recovery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: In 2024, the ozone hole over the Antarctic showed a notable reduction in size, ranking as the seventh smallest since monitoring began post-Montreal Protocol. This improvement is credited to ongoing reductions in CFC emissions and enhanced atmospheric dynamics…
articles.content:
September 28, 2024
